title: Ikea

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose a player during the day to force them to shop at IKEA

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-At night, a menu with 9 choices pops up
-You may select one of these choices, and this choice will be the exit to the IKEA
-If your target selects correct one, they may leave the building and continue on with their night action
-If they fail to escape, they will be roleblocked for the night
-If someone fails to escape, you learn their role
-All abilities used on your target will fail, except for tracker (54) who will also become trapped in the Ikea the next night with your target
-You have powerful defense because youâ€™re a building
